com.automatak.dnp3

Class OutstationConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.automatak.dnp3.OutstationConfig

  • public class OutstationConfig
extends Object
    Configuration class that controls how an outstation behaves

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean allowTimeSync
      if true, the outstation will request time synchronization on an interval.
      boolean disableUnsol
      if true, fully disables unsolicited mode as if the slave didn't support it, defaults to false
      GroupVariation eventAnalogInput
      The default group/variation to use for analog event responses (default 32:1)
      GroupVariation eventBinaryInput
      The default group/variation to use for binary event responses (default 2:1)
      GroupVariation eventCounter
      The default group/variation to use for counter event responses (default 22:1)
      GroupVariation eventVto
      The default group/variation to use for VTO event responses (default 113, 0)
      int maxAnalogEvents
      The number of analog events the slave will buffer before overflowing (defaults to 1000)
      int maxBinaryEvents
      The number of binary events the slave will buffer before overflowing (defaults to 1000)
      int maxControls
      The maximum number of controls the slave will attempt to process from a single APDU, defaults to 1
      int maxCounterEvents
      The number of counter events the slave will buffer before overflowing (defaults to 1000)
      int maxFragSize
      The maximum fragment size the slave will use for data it sends.
      int maxVtoEvents
      The number of vto events the slave will buffer before overflowing (defaults to 100)
      GroupVariation staticAnalogInput
      The default group/variation to use for static analog responses (default 30:1)
      GroupVariation staticAnalogOutputStatus
      The default group/variation to use for static AnalogOutput status responses (default 40:1)
      GroupVariation staticBinaryInput
      The default group/variation to use for static binary responses (default 1:2)
      GroupVariation staticCounter
      The default group/variation to use for static counter responses (default 20:1)
      long timeSyncPeriodMs
      The period of time sync interval in milliseconds.
      int unsolMask
      controls what unsol classes are enabled by default.
      long unsolPackDelayMs
      The amount of time in milliseconds the slave will wait before sending new unsolicited data ( <= 0 == immediately, no delay).
      long unsolRetryDelayMs
      How long the slave will wait in milliseconds before retrying an unsuccessful unsolicited response Defaults to 2000ms.
      int vtoWriterQueueSize
      The number of objects to store in the VtoWriter queue.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OutstationConfig()
      Outstation constructor with reasonable defaults

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • maxControls

        public int maxControls
        The maximum number of controls the slave will attempt to process from a single APDU, defaults to 1

      • disableUnsol

        public boolean disableUnsol
        if true, fully disables unsolicited mode as if the slave didn't support it, defaults to false

      • unsolMask

        public int unsolMask
        controls what unsol classes are enabled by default. defaults to Class 1, 2, & 3 Use PointClass.getMask to set this value

      • allowTimeSync

        public boolean allowTimeSync
        if true, the outstation will request time synchronization on an interval. Defaults to false.

      • timeSyncPeriodMs

        public long timeSyncPeriodMs
        The period of time sync interval in milliseconds. Defaults to 10 minutes (10 * 60 * 1000)

      • unsolPackDelayMs

        public long unsolPackDelayMs
        The amount of time in milliseconds the slave will wait before sending new unsolicited data ( <= 0 == immediately, no delay). Defaults to 200ms.

      • unsolRetryDelayMs

        public long unsolRetryDelayMs
        How long the slave will wait in milliseconds before retrying an unsuccessful unsolicited response Defaults to 2000ms.

      • maxFragSize

        public int maxFragSize
        The maximum fragment size the slave will use for data it sends. Defaults to 2048.

      • vtoWriterQueueSize

        public int vtoWriterQueueSize
        The number of objects to store in the VtoWriter queue. Defaults to 1024.

      • maxBinaryEvents

        public int maxBinaryEvents
        The number of binary events the slave will buffer before overflowing (defaults to 1000)

      • maxAnalogEvents

        public int maxAnalogEvents
        The number of analog events the slave will buffer before overflowing (defaults to 1000)

      • maxCounterEvents

        public int maxCounterEvents
        The number of counter events the slave will buffer before overflowing (defaults to 1000)

      • maxVtoEvents

        public int maxVtoEvents
        The number of vto events the slave will buffer before overflowing (defaults to 100)

      • staticBinaryInput

        public final GroupVariation staticBinaryInput
        The default group/variation to use for static binary responses (default 1:2)

      • staticAnalogInput

        public final GroupVariation staticAnalogInput
        The default group/variation to use for static analog responses (default 30:1)

      • staticCounter

        public final GroupVariation staticCounter
        The default group/variation to use for static counter responses (default 20:1)

      • staticAnalogOutputStatus

        public final GroupVariation staticAnalogOutputStatus
        The default group/variation to use for static AnalogOutput status responses (default 40:1)

      • eventBinaryInput

        public final GroupVariation eventBinaryInput
        The default group/variation to use for binary event responses (default 2:1)

      • eventAnalogInput

        public final GroupVariation eventAnalogInput
        The default group/variation to use for analog event responses (default 32:1)

      • eventCounter

        public final GroupVariation eventCounter
        The default group/variation to use for counter event responses (default 22:1)

      • eventVto

        public final GroupVariation eventVto
        The default group/variation to use for VTO event responses (default 113, 0)

    • Constructor Detail

      • OutstationConfig

        public OutstationConfig()
        Outstation constructor with reasonable defaults
